name: RHINOSPORT Door Pull Up Bar Doorway No-Screw from 69-92 cm (27.1in-36.2in) Workout Equipment for Home Gym Upper Body Workout Non-slip 2x EXTRA Foam Padding for Ultimate Door Frame Protection
short_description: 【Upgraded Security - Eject Protection】 Experience our original spring automatic extrusion design. When under pressure, the upper and lower springs instantly squeeze against the wall, providing a powerful anti-slip and eject-proof grip for ultimate peace of mind.

【Firmly Locked & Ultra-Stable】The upgraded triple-gear lock mechanism securely locks the bar in place, preventing any rotation or loosening during use. Combined with the thickened stainless steel tube, it guarantees unwavering stability and safety for workouts up to 200kg/440lb.

【MAXIMUM Door Frame Protection & Easy Setup】 We go the extra mile to protect your home. Not only does the bar feature soft, non-slip PVC on all contact points, but we also include 2 EXTRA high-density foam pads. Place them between the bar and your door frame for a dual-layer protection system that virtually eliminates marks or damage. Installation is tool-free, quick, and fits most doorways.

【Ergonomic Grips for Versatile Training】The full-covered, high-quality EVA foam handles provide superior comfort and minimize hand fatigue. The design accommodates both narrow and wide grips, allowing you to target different muscle groups effectively and avoid calluses.

【Versatile Home Gym & Assured Quality】Unlock a full-body workout—from pull-ups and chin-ups to sit-ups and dips. This bar is your all-in-one fitness solution. Backed by our satisfaction guarantee, we offer a hassle-free replacement or refund. Please remember to measure your doorframe before purchasing!
